"I would advise you not to struggle."
—Huatli

foreignData.flavorText: „Zapple nicht so herum, dann wird es ein schneller Tod." —Huatli
foreignData.name: Todesmaul-Tyrann
foreignData.text: Erzürnen — Immer wenn dem Todesmaul-Tyrannen Schaden zugefügt wird, schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, ins Exil, bis der Todesmaul-Tyrann das Spiel verlässt.

foreignData.name: Tirano faucetrampa
foreignData.text: Enfurecer — Siempre que el Tirano faucetrampa reciba daño, exilia la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente hasta que el Tirano faucetrampa deje el campo de batalla.

foreignData.flavorText: « Je te conseille de ne pas te débattre. » —Huatli
foreignData.name: Tyran aux mâchoires-collet
foreignData.text: Rage — À chaque fois que le Tyran aux mâchoires-collet subit des blessures, exilez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle jusqu'à ce que le Tyran aux mâchoires-collet quitte le champ de bataille.

foreignData.name: Tiranno Serrafauci
foreignData.text: Infuriare — Ogniqualvolta viene inflitto danno al Tiranno Serrafauci, esilia una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario finché il Tiranno Serrafauci non lascia il campo di battaglia.

foreignData.flavorText: 「抵抗しないで。忠告よ。」 ――ファートリ
foreignData.name: 罠顎の暴君
foreignData.text: 激昂 ― 罠顎の暴君にダメージが与えられるたび、対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。罠顎の暴君が戦場を離れるまで、それを追放する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜

foreignData.name: 올가미턱 폭군
foreignData.text: 격노 — 올가미턱 폭군이 피해를 입을 때마다, 상대가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 올가미턱 폭군이 전장을 떠날 때까지 추방한다.

foreignData.name: Tirano Armandíbula
foreignData.text: Enfurecer — Toda vez que Tirano Armandíbula sofrer dano, exile a criatura alvo que um oponente controla até que Tirano Armandíbula deixe o campo de batalha.

foreignData.name: Капканозубый Тиран
foreignData.text: Неистовство — Каждый раз, когда Капканозубому Тирану наносятся повреждения, изгоните целевое существо под контролем оппонента до тех пор, пока Капканозубый Тиран не покинет поле битвы.

foreignData.name: 殘暴籠顎龍
foreignData.text: 激怒～每當殘暴籠顎龍受到傷害時，放逐目標由對手操控的生物，直到殘暴籠顎龍離開戰場為止。

name: Trapjaw Tyrant
originalText: Enrage — Whenever Trapjaw Tyrant is dealt damage, exile target creature an opponent controls until Trapjaw Tyrant leaves the battlefield.

rulings.text: If Trapjaw Tyrant leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability resolves (most likely because it was dealt lethal damage), the target creature won’t be exiled.

Auras attached to the exiled creature will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Any Equipment will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled creature will cease to exist.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won’t return to the battlefield.
If multiple sources deal damage to a creature with an enrage ability at the same time, most likely because multiple creatures blocked that creature, the enrage ability triggers only once.

If lethal damage is dealt to a creature with an enrage ability, that ability triggers. The creature with that enrage ability leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, so it won’t be affected by the resolving ability.

text: Enrage — Whenever Trapjaw Tyrant is dealt damage, exile target creature an opponent controls until Trapjaw Tyrant leaves the battlefield.
